text: Teen Mom OG star Maci Bookout was granted a two - year restraining order against her ex Ryan Edwards after a court appearance on Monday, May 21, E! News reports. Bookout ’ s husband, Taylor McKinney, and their two children, Jayde, nearly 3, and Maverick, nearly 2, were also granted two - year restraining orders against Edwards. The troubled reality star, 30, will still be able to see his 9 - year - old son, Bentley, whom he shares with Bookout, under the restraining order. “ We did agree to a restraining order where Ryan will not go within 100 feet of Maci and her current husband and their two children.
